Author: jl777c#5810
Content: but we are now at the point where new coins (not security) can create a differentiated value add via the CC

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and all the rest of the infrastructure, including a blockchain!, is already done

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: a full blockchain codebase is hundreds of thousands of lines of code

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: a custom CC is typically 1000 lines or so

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: that is a 99% reduction of codebase and sometimes there isnt any coding needed to create a unique value

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: anyway, for all of the "only marketing matters" people, please look at XVG

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there are now many new projects that appear to be corporate backed or actual corporations, these have the advantage of focus and capital, but being corporate in nature has the problems of being proprietary. even if they are open source, it is not likely they have an open community

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in the last year, we have seen how the open community in KMD has blossomed and now we have new devs doing things across the entire ecosystem

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I cant even keep up with all the different things at this point

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so I concentrate on the core and keep tinkering with the new breakthroughs

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and I trust the community to fully productize and market and sell the finished products

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content:
`I cant even keep up with all the different things at this point`
It's quite sad how few will grasp just how much that sentence means (or on how many different levels it has meaning) in a truly short amount of time, because so many folks are so focused on "this minute" and 1-2 years being "forever".

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and I only talk about tech/code things, i lost track of the non-code things happening long before

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: since I am able to track a lot of tech things at once, the fact that I cant keep up anymore is definitely some sort of tipping point

Author: ComputerGenie 👴🏼📢#7004
Content: exactly

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and if you are feeling that you cant keep up with all the tech happening, then it is not a bad thing, it just means a lot of stuff is happening

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and probably nobody has the full complete picture

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so to expect marketing/GUI to be tracking this in realtime, well, that would be the true "FTL" invention that i have no idea how to even approach solving
